titleStmt.title: A Second beacon fired humbly presented to the Lord Protector and the Parliament by the publishers of the first : with their humble petition, that they would do what may be expected from Christian magistrates, in suppressing blasphemous books.
titleStmt.author: Fawne, Luke, d. 1666.

notesStmt.note: This pamphlet was one of a series in a controversy over the publication of seditious or blasphemous works.
By the so-called "Six booksellers"; signed (p. 12): Luke Fawne, Famuel Gellibrand, Joshua Kirton, John Rothwell, Thomas Underhill, Nathanael Webb.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
